title: Adobe Target Activity Event
description: Represents executed Adobe Target activity and activity events.

xdm:strategy.title: Activity Event Strategy
xdm:strategy.description: Custom behavior strategy for both content viewing and counting when visiting a success metric.

meta:enum.none: Continue to display content from the same experience. Never count the visitor more than once.
meta:enum.reconvert: Continue to display content from the same experience. Count the visitor again if they visit any other mbox before visiting this success metric again.
meta:enum.alwaysConvert: Continue to display content from the same experience. Count the visitor again every time they visit this success metric
meta:enum.restartSameExperience: Continue to display content from the same experience. Count the visitor again if they re-fulfill the campaign entry conditions.
meta:enum.restartRandomExperience: Run experience selection again to determine the content to display. Count the visitor again if they re-fulfill the campaign entry conditions.
meta:enum.restartNewExperience: Run experience selection again to determine the content to display, but exclude any experiences the visitor has already seen. Count the visitor again if they re-fulfill the campaign entry conditions.
meta:enum.excludeSameExperience: Continue to display content from the same experience. Never count the visitor more than once.
meta:enum.excludeDefaultContent: Display default content. Never count the visitor again.

xdm:score.title: Engagement Metric Score
xdm:score.description: The capture score engagement metric calculates an aggregated score based on the value assigned to pages visited on the site, from the point the visitor first sees the campaign's first display mbox.
